frame.name: Measure_linear_extent
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame is concerned with nouns that denote <fen>Unit</fen>s of measurement for linear extent. The Frame Elements are <fen>Unit</fen>, <fen>Count</fen>, and <fen>Stuff</fen>.<ex>The shirt is made from <fex name="Count">12</fex> <t><fex name="Unit">miles</fex></t> <fex name="Stuff">of pure cotton</fex>.</ex><ex><fex name="Count">81</fex> <t><fex name="Unit">miles</fex></t> <fex name="Stuff">of dyke</fex> are still visible from this point.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Count
FE.definition: <def-root>The number of <fen>Unit</fen>s of the linear extent.<ex><fex name="Count">Five</fex> <t><fex name="Unit">miles</fex></t> <fex name="Stuff">of pipework</fex> were necessary.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Stuff
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Stuff</fen> whose linear extent is being measured.<ex><t><fex name="Unit">Miles</fex></t> <fex name="Stuff">of wiring</fex> were necessary.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Unit
FE.definition: <def-root>The standardized quantity in terms of which other quantities of the same kind are measured.<ex><t><fex name="Unit">Miles</fex></t> <fex name="Stuff">of telephone cables</fex> had to be replaced.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Dimension
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE marks constituents which express what property is being measured.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: inch.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a unit of linear measure equal to one twelfth of a foot (2.54 cm)

lexUnit.name: mile.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a unit of linear measure equal to 1,760 yards (approximately 1.609 kilometres).

lexUnit.name: yard.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a unit of linear measure equal to 3 feet (0.9144 metre).

lexUnit.name: foot.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a unit of linear measure equal to 12 inches (30.48 cm).

lexUnit.name: meter.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the fundamental unit of length in the metric system, equal to 100 centimetres (approx. 39.37 inches).

lexUnit.name: kilometer.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a metric unit of measurement equal to 1,000 metres (approximately 0.62 miles).

lexUnit.name: centimeter.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a metric unit of length equal to one hundredth of a metre

lexUnit.name: millimeter.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: one thousandth of a metre (0.039 in.)

lexUnit.name: furlong.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an eighth of a mile, 220 yards.

lexUnit.name: light-year.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a unit of distance equivalent to the distance that light travels in one year, 9.4607E12 km (nearly 6 million million miles).
